name: One in the Museum
description:
Sorry, but this is an early prototype. You could play this only with xbox 360 controller plugged in, or it won't be able to play. It's because I couldn't find any other way to detect whether mouse is plugged in or not.

Use trigger RT/LT to fast or slow the time. and use joystick to move around object.

The goal is simple, you need to make the pillar hit the bell before it completely lying on the wood shelf. 

Press "Start" Button to restart or proceed to the next level.

But as game progress, the goal might not be that important anymore. Enjoy the game time.
